GET requests.GET /api/topics/:topic/articles: Return all the articles for a certain topic
GET requests.GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments: Returns all the comments for a individual article
GET requests.GET /api/users: Returns a JSON object with all the existing users
GET requests.GET /api/users/:username: Returns a JSON object with the profile data for the specified user.

POST requests.POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments: Add a new comment to an article. This route requires a JSON body with a comment key and value pair

PUT requests.PUT /api/articles/:article_id: Increment or Decrement the votes of an article by one. This route requires a vote query of 'up' or 'down' e.g /api/articles/:article_id?vote=up
PUT requests.PUT /api/comments/:comment_id: Increment or Decrement the votes of a comment by one. This route requires a vote query of 'up' or 'down' e.g /api/comments/:comment_id?vote=down

DELETE requests.DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id: Deletes a comment with that comment id, also decrement comment count for that article
